This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Looked up and saw a glowing object over the house.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting in the jacuzzi facing west, then I noticed a glowing object low on the horizon, and then I watched it gain altitude and came towards us, faster than an airplane. After five or six seconds it was right overhead. It appeared to have a warm, golden, orange glow. Couldn't see any features, looked like plasma. My husband saw the object also and we watched it go east and then disappear from view. We noticed that one of Christine Dickey's photos matched the object perfectly. Her photo will be attached to this report.
